title: How Noam Chomsky and Bard College President Got Involved with Jeffrey Epstein
description: Noam Chomsky and Bard College President Leon Botstein have been linked to Jeffrey Epstein. Epstein was a convicted sex offender who had been accused of sexually abusing girls as young as 14 years old. In this video, we explore the involvement of Chomsky and Botstein with Epstein.
